version_description:
Please kindly note that we cannot reply your reviews in the App Store. If you have any problem, please do not hesitate to contact us directly from http://forum.pdf.wondershare.com or Facebook @PDFelement.

What’s New in version 4.1.0:
- Greatly improved the user experience with text editing.
- Improved the compatibility of PDF files.
- Now you can trigger the annotating tools by long pressing on the selected text.
- Improved the user’s reading experience with previously opened documents.
- Fixed other known bugs.

Please kindly note that we cannot reply your reviews in the App Store. If you have any problem, please do not hesitate to contact us directly from http://forum.pdf.wondershare.com or Facebook @PDFelement or email us to pdfelement@wondershare.com . If you think this App helps you, your positive review in the App Store would be much appreciated.

What's New in 4.2.0
- Improved annotation experience with floating toolbar.
- Added page navigation with scrollbar.
- Improved experience with text selection, text editing, and page editing features.
- Users will now be prompted to save or discard changes when exit editing mode.

PDFelement is Also Available on MAC App Store with even more powerful features and customization options for PDF editing! Search "PDFelement" on Mac App Store and Try FREE today!

What's New in version 4.3.0 :
- Now support full-trial on annotation, text editing, page editing features before purchase the IAP full-feature pack.  
- Added localized support for German, French, Italian, Japanese, Spanish and Portuguese.
- Improved user experiences when selecting and editing text.
- Fixed an issue where the content could not be displayed properly after filling the form.
- Fixed an issue where Chinese characters could not be typed in on devices running iOS version 10.0 or later.
- Fixed an issue where Pencil was unable to add annotations on zoomed in page.
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed the issue of been unable to import PDF files from other applications.

- Now for limited time, you can unlock all PDFelement features for FREE by simply signing up with a Wondershare ID!
- Greatly improved UI / UX, with all-new adaptive UX design specifically for iPad.
- Improved the operation for document management.
- Greatly improved and enhanced the feature of "create PDF from scanning", now with the auto-recognition on target object.
- Improved the UX for file conversion.

- Fixed the issue where users are unable to access Dropbox.
- Now support express PDF creation from 3D Touch scanning.
- Improved the compatibility with iOS 11.
- PDFelement now supports iPhone X.
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed some bugs.
- Fixed some bugs.

- Fixed some bugs.
If you like this app, we'd appreciate if you could take a moment to rate us on the App Store!

- Fixed some bugs.
If you like this app, we'd appreciate if you could take a moment to rate us on the App Store!
- Due to General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), we add Privacy Policy Agreement to agree upon entering the app.

- Fixed some bugs and improve experience.
If you think this app is helpful, please take a moment to rate&review our app!

- Fixed "Registration Failed" error;
- Support saving changes manually while editing file to ensure saving data effectively.
- Support the latest iOS 10.12.
- Support the latest iPhone Xs Max.

- Google Drive and OneDrive is temporarily hided because of failure in log in and downloading files.
- Adapt to the New 12.9" iPad Pro.
- Solve the issue where users cannot download PDFs from File App and Tencent QQ.
-Fix minor bugs.

Improved product stability under iOS 13.
Fixed the issue of disordered annotation style under iOS 13.
Limited Time Offer! Upgrade to PDFelement Pro lifetime version at a super low price now!
*  PDFelement is newly released. Just upgrade it and you will be able to enjoy a special upgrade discount!
